attributes.action: legalise witchcraft and wicca to religous status
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we ask that the prime minister legalise wicca and witchcraft so it is no longer discriminated against by people of other religous sects. 
we ask this so it is not misconsruded anymore by the goverment and allow us to be made equal to all other religion's which we are not at the moment, it is written in the human rights act that we are all allowed freedom of religion and belief system so wicca is no different,

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
